reviews_with_mentions: • TriedLA Chapter for breakfast on a Tuesday morning for a business meeting. Service was great. Food was very good, a bit off beat but that's what makes it cool. The chairs though have to go. So very uncomfortable. Again it is still a great find in downtown.
